title: vaddhanuNDunadhE
sahitya:
vaddanuNDunadE bahu mElu vArijAkSa

anupallavi

 addampu mOmugala ranga anupama mOhanAnga

caraNam 1

 bangAru pUla pUjintu bAguga ninnu sEvintu shrngArinci kaugalintu cEri ninnArAdhindhu
   
caraNam 2

 mungala nE naTiyintu muddu mATala deliyintu sangItamu vinupintu sAreku nE santOSintu
   
caraNam 3

 satta mAtramA nIyandu jittamugAni pOdendu tattaramu dIrcukondu tyAgarAja sulabhuDandu
